iopair.description: perform a select Good inputs:1) environement variable is set to a value whose length mod 3 is 0 or 1Bad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length mod 3 is not 0 or 1

if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;
